tool_description: The SEO Keyword Extraction API, aptly titled "SEO Keyword Extraction," is your all-in-one solution for retrieving essential SEO tag details from a provided URL. Whether you're looking for H1, H2, H3, DIV, TABLE, LINK, or other SEO tags, this API delivers comprehensive insights in a user-friendly manner. Simply use the "Extract SEO Tags from URL" endpoint to obtain SEO tags effortlessly and at a reasonable price.
name: SEO Keyword Extraction
title: SEO Keyword Extraction

api_list.name: Extract SEO Tags from URL
api_list.description: Use endpoint /api/v1/seo?url=<url address> to extract SEO tags , such as H1, H2, H3, Tables, Links etc.
